Class Block

java.lang.Object
fr.florian.engine.objects.Entity
fr.florian.engine.objects.Block
public class Block extends Entity
Represents a single block in a voxel world. Extends the generic Entity class to include an identifier and block-specific logic.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final Vector3f
    SIZE
    Constant size for all blocks (unit cube).

  • Field Details

    • SIZE

      public static final Vector3f SIZE
      Constant size for all blocks (unit cube).

  • Constructor Details

    • Block

      public Block(int id, Vector3f position, Vector3f rotation, Vector3f scale, Mesh mesh)
      Constructs a new Block with a given ID, transform, and mesh. Automatically creates the mesh (uploads it to GPU).
      Parameters:
      id - The block's type ID.
      position - The world position of the block.
      rotation - The rotation of the block (usually zero).
      scale - The scale of the block (typically 1,1,1).
      mesh - The mesh to render the block.

  • Method Details

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Returns the block's ID.
      Returns:
      The unique integer identifier of the block.

    • isAir

      public boolean isAir()
      Checks if this block is considered "air" (non-solid / invisible).
      Returns:
      True if the block is air (ID 0), false otherwise.
